===Etymology===

|m-s=ren2min2

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[people]] {{gloss|collectively}}
#: {{zh-x|孟子 曰：「^諸侯 之 寶 三：土地、人民、政事。寶 珠玉 者，殃 必 及身。」|Mencius said, "These three are precious to a prince: the territory, the '''people''', and governmental affairs. Calamity is sure to befall the one who values pearls and jades."|CL}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|人民}} can only refer to people collectively, as a unit. To refer to people as individually countable persons, use {{zh-l|人}}. To refer to people in an otherwise general sense, use {{zh-l|人們}}.

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じん|みん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=じんみん}} compound {{m|ltc|人民|tr=*njin *min}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|人民|tr=rénmín}}, {{etyl|wuu|-}} {{m|zh|人民|tr=zen min (T3)}}, {{etyl|nan|-}} {{m|zh|人民|tr=jîn-bîn}}.

Formerly pronounced with a consistent {{m|ja|呉音|goon}} reading of ''ninmin'', later changing to a mixed {{m|ja|漢音|kan'on}} / {{m|ja|呉音|goon}} reading of ''jinmin''.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|じんみん|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じんみん}}

# the [[people]], the general [[public]], the [[citizen]]s

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|人民委員|じんみん いいん}}: [[commissar]] {{qualifier|of the former Soviet Union}}
* {{ja-r|人民委員会|じんみん いいんかい}}: [[commissariat]] {{qualifier|of the former Soviet Union}}
* {{ja-r|人民解放軍|^じんみん ^かいほう ^ぐん}}: the [[People's Liberation Army]] ([[PLA]]) {{qualifier|of China}}
* {{ja-r|人民憲章|^じんみん ^けんしょう}}: the [[w:People%27s_Charter_of_1838#People.27s_Charter_of_1838|People's Charter]] {{qualifier|as established in 1838 in the UK}}
* {{ja-r|人民公社|じんみん こうしゃ}}: a people's [[commune]] {{qualifier|in China}}
* {{ja-r|人民裁判|じんみん さいばん}}: a people's [[court]]
* {{ja-r|人民主義|じんみん しゅぎ}}: [[populism]]
* {{ja-r|人民主権|じんみん しゅけん}}: [[popular]] [[sovereignty]], the idea that sovereignty resides in the [[people]]
* {{ja-r|人民戦線|じんみん せんせん}}: a [[popular]] [[front]] {{qualifier|as in the name of a group or organization}}
* {{ja-r|人民大会堂|^じんみん ^だい ^かいどう}}: the [[w:Great Hall of the People|Great Hall of the People]] {{qualifier|in Beijing}}
* {{ja-r|人民投票|じんみん とうひょう}}: a [[national]] [[referendum]], a [[vote]] by the [[people]] of a [[nation]]
* {{ja-r|人民日報|^じんみん ^にっぽう}}: the [[w:People's Daily|People's Daily]], the state [[media]] of Beijing
* {{ja-r|人民服|じんみん ふく}}: the “people's clothes” → a [[Mao suit]]
* {{ja-r|人民民主主義|じんみん みんしゅしゅぎ}}: [[people's]] [[democracy]]
{{der-bottom}}
